title: The Unexpected Journey of David Collins, Supercoach
summary: David Collins, a 22-year-old advisor and coach, discovers his ability to inspire literal superpowers in others over the course of a week, leading to a showdown that saves his city.
summaryGerman: David Collins, ein 22-jähriger Berater und Trainer, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, im Laufe einer Woche wörtlich Superkräfte in anderen zu inspirieren, was zu einem Showdown führt, der seine Stadt rettet.
summaryDutch: David Collins, een 22-jarige adviseur en coach, ontdekt zijn vermogen om letterlijk superkrachten in anderen te inspireren gedurende een week, wat leidt tot een confrontatie die zijn stad redt.
summaryFrench: David Collins, un conseiller et coach de 22 ans, découvre sa capacité à inspirer des super-pouvoirs littéraux chez les autres au cours d'une semaine, menant à un affrontement qui sauve sa ville.

story.text: David discovers his unusual ability to empower others when his casual advice at the gym leads one man to lift twice his limit.
Encouraged by yesterday's incident, David experiments by coaching his friends; they achieve tasks they deemed impossible before.
News spreads, and David is approached by local heroes to boost their abilities to fight crime, which he does successfully from a distance.
David feels the strain of his powers as demands increase, making him wonder about the limits and consequences of his ability.
A villain, seeking to harness David's power for evil, kidnaps him; his friends rally to save him, empowered by the very abilities he helped them discover.
David and his friends confront the villain; their teamwork and David's strategic advice lead to a hard-fought victory.
The city celebrates David and his team's heroism with a peaceful march, recognizing him as 'Supercoach'.

ending: In a world where everyone looks for a hero, sometimes what they really need is a coach.
moral: The true power of a leader is not to create followers, but to inspire others to find their own strengths.
